price: İyi bilin ki, onlar bozguncuların ta kendileridir. Fakat farkında değillerdir.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: alā innahum humu al-muf'sidūna walākin lā yashʿurūna
